html:
Chrome: All four formats should be exported successfully with data labels and otherwise look like the chart (except smaller size).

FF: Same as Chrome.

Safari: Same as Chrome, though might open results in new tab instead of downloading.

Edge: PDF export should fail, the others should work as in Chrome.

IE (10/11): Same as Edge.

IE (9 and older): Always falls back (offline download not supported). Same for all demos.
